title: SC EP:49 Bigfoot encounter stories
itunes:title: SC EP:49 Bigfoot encounter stories
description:
A listener wrote the show and wanted to share his encounter when he was a child and how he was stalked by a Sasquatch on his paper route.

We will also be hearing from two other guests who also share their encounters with the creature.
content:encoded:
